Dungeon Crawler

Age of the Void: Reaper of Souls (I didn't pick the name) was part of a 3 month team project to introduce students to the Unity engine and Git source control in a team enviroment.

Skills

My bachelors in Game Development gave me the education and training I need to create and debug game engines and gameplay systems mainly in C++ and C#.

Object Instantiation

Object Factory and component assembly

Assets

Layout structure and managment (joint work on C# tool)

Communications

Observer pattern, deffered event listeners, messaging

GPU Particles

Basic emitter and colored quad particle

Animation Subsystem

Gameplay joint manipulation and overrides

Type Deduction

Used templates to tie classes and strings to IDs at compile time

Let's build something together.
